description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nTrick or Treat!:
After this creature takes damage from an attack or spell, it {ACTION_casts} [icons,1968]Fireball on the enemy. After this creature {ACTION_attacks}, it has a 35% chance to {ACTION_cast} [icons,1968]Grand Fireball.
name: Spooky Lantern
